name: Chocolate Wars
description:
Pixel art twin stick shooter made for the Love2D Jam 2021 with the theme chocolate. Is a unfinished game that needs a lot of polish but is playable and I think a little bit fun. I am eager to get your feedback, so please play it and tell me how it feels. It´s the first game I show to the public and I expecting constructive critics.

The game follows the path of games like Geometry Wars and Super Smash TV.

Right now the game have 4 kind of enemies and can be played with the keyboard and mouse or with controller. Personally I recomend to use a controller like Xbox one.
